text: 1.23 Ais 8.14, Mat 11.6, Jon 6.60, 6.66, Lom 9.32, 1 Ko 2.14, Gal 5.11 Chɨn pen Klays mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl pak tɨbɨk lel kumak takaw ak agñɨbun. Agñon, Juda binɨb okok nɨŋɨd, takaw yɨlɨk gup ak chɨn nɨŋɨd apyap pakɨnɨgun agɨl gos nepal. Pen binɨb Juda mel okok nɨŋɨd, takaw sawl ak ma nɨgɨnɨgun agɨl gos nepal.
